title: Ultimate Marvel Team-Up
description:
Ultimate Marvel Team-Up is a comic book series, published by Marvel Comics which ran for 16 issues, including a concluding Ultimate Spider-Man Super Special. It is set in one of Marvel's shared universes, the Ultimate Universe. The whole series starred Spider-Man teaming up with another superhero each issue. The series was written by Brian Michael Bendis, with each arc drawn by a different artist.

Issue  #1    : Spider-Man & Wolverine 
Issues #2-3  : Spider-Man & Hulk 
Issues #4-5  : Spider-Man & Iron Man
Issues #6-8  : Spider-Man, the Punisher and Daredevil 
Issue  #9    : Spider-Man & the Fantastic Four 
Issue  #10   : Spider-Man & the Man-Thing & Dr. Curt Conners (a.k.a. Lizard) 
Issue  #11   : Spider-Man & the X-Men 
Issues #12-13: Spider-Man and Doctor Strange 
Issue  #14   : Spider-Man & the Black Widow 
Issues #15-16: Spider-Man & Shang-Chi 


Note: Issue 11 is missing in this torrent.
